alert.note: Alert for Bibb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 10:31AM CST until January 12 at 11:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN TUSCALOOSA AND CENTRAL BIBB COUNTIES... At 1031 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Low Gap, or 14 miles south of Tuscaloosa, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Brent, Centreville, Vance, West Blocton, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Low Gap, Eoline, North Bibb, Marvel, Six Mile, Hagler, Pearson, Hebron and Harmon. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
